channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国高速公路结冰 100辆汽车连成堆 多人受伤
item.description: Several people were injured after more than 100 cars collided into each other on an icy stretch of an expressway in the Chinese city of Suzhou, Chinese media reported on Friday, the latest accident caused by extreme weather conditions.翻译:据中国媒体周五报道，中国苏州市一条高速公路结冰路段发生100多辆汽车相撞事故，造成多人受伤，这是极端天气条件引发的最新一起事故。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 外国首次亮相，但新加坡航展上几乎没有国防交易
item.description: The Singapore Airshow included the foreign debuts of new weapons systems, growing interest in systems that could destroy ballistic missiles and swat down drones - but it was missing any Russian presence and major defence deals were scarce.翻译:新加坡航展包括新武器系统在国外的首次亮相，人们对能够摧毁弹道导弹和击落无人机的系统越来越感兴趣，但它没有看到任何俄罗斯的存在，而且重大国防交易也很少。
item.author: Gerry Doyle

item.title: 新西兰重新评估南极基地的检修提议
item.description: New Zealand is reassessing a proposed overhaul of its Antarctica base after negotiations with a construction firm reached a deadlock due to budget issues, the government agency responsible for the country's Antarctic operations said on Friday.翻译:负责新西兰南极运营的政府机构周五表示，由于预算问题，新西兰与一家建筑公司的谈判陷入僵局，正在重新评估对其南极洲基地的拟议检修。
item.author: Lucy Craymer

item.title: 立法者称，美国针对中国生物技术公司的法案可能更加“狭隘”
item.description: A bill in the U.S. Congress targeting Chinese biotech companies may end up being more "narrowly tailored", the U.S. lawmaker who proposed it said on Friday, adding that he was cautiously optimistic something could be passed this year.翻译:提出该法案的美国议员周五表示，美国国会针对中国生物技术公司的一项法案最终可能会更加“狭隘”，并补充说他对今年可能通过的法案持谨慎乐观态度。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 独家：中国警察在夏威夷太平洋邻国基里巴斯工作
item.description: Chinese police are working in the remote atoll nation of Kiribati, a Pacific Ocean neighbour of Hawaii, with uniformed officers involved in community policing and a crime database program, Kiribati officials told Reuters.翻译:基里巴斯官员告诉路透社，中国警察正在偏远的环礁国家基里巴斯工作，基里巴斯是夏威夷的太平洋邻国，身穿制服的警察参与社区治安和犯罪数据库项目。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 股市沐浴在科技股的欣喜之中，英伟达的繁荣
item.description: Global stock markets were on course for a week of heady gains on Friday as AI darling Nvidia's stunning results sparked a wave of record highs from Asia to Europe and the U.S., while the yen nursed losses on a range of currencies.翻译:周五，全球股市将迎来一周的强劲上涨，人工智能宠儿英伟达的惊人业绩引发了从亚洲到欧洲和美国的一波创纪录高点，而日元则导致一系列货币下跌。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 货币交易者继续做空，日元下跌
item.description: The yen sagged to fresh lows on the euro, sterling and other crosses this week and headed for a fourth weekly drop on the dollar as investors chased better yields just about everywhere but Japan, wagering rates there would stay near zero for some time.翻译:本周，日元兑欧元、英镑和其他交叉货币汇率跌至新低，美元汇率也将连续第四周下跌，因为除了日本之外，几乎所有地方的投资者都在追逐更高的收益率，而日本的投注利率将在一段时间内保持在接近于零的水平。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车将稀释电动汽车制造商 Polestar 的股份
item.description: Volvo Cars said on Friday it plans to distribute 62.7% of its stake worth 9.5 billion crowns ($920.17 million) in Swedish electric vehicle manufacturer Polestar Automotive Holding to its own shareholders.翻译:沃尔沃汽车周五表示，计划将其持有的瑞典电动汽车制造商 Polestar Automotive Holding 价值 95 亿克朗（合 9.2017 亿美元）的 62.7% 股份分配给自己的股东。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英伟达在文件中首次将华为列为最大竞争对手
item.description: Nvidia identified Huawei as a top competitor in several categories, including artificial intelligence chips, for the first time in a filing with the Securities and Exchange commission late Wednesday.翻译:英伟达在周三晚间向美国证券交易委员会提交的文件中首次将华为列为人工智能芯片等多个类别的最大竞争对手。
item.author: Max Cherney, Stephen Nellis

item.title: 日本在芯片复兴的漫长道路上伸出援助之手
item.description: Chipmaker TSMC formally opens its first Japanese plant on Saturday, highlighting the Taiwanese firm's critical role in Tokyo's multi-billion dollar efforts to reboot its once-mighty semiconductor manufacturing industry.翻译:芯片制造商台积电于周六正式开设第一家日本工厂，凸显这家台湾公司在东京斥资数十亿美元重启其曾经强大的半导体制造业的努力中发挥的关键作用。
item.author: Sam Nussey, Miho Uranaka

item.title: Booking Holdings 因亚洲需求复苏而超出第四季度利润预期
item.description: Online travel agent Booking Holdings beat analysts' expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, driven by a strong recovery in Asian markets.翻译:受亚洲市场强劲复苏的推动，在线旅行社 Booking Holdings 周四第四季度利润超出分析师预期。
item.author: Kannaki Deka, Aishwarya Jain

item.title: 早盘竞价：随着全球股市的繁荣，记录被打破
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 最后时刻的乌龙球让伊蒂哈德队进入全沙特亚冠四分之一决赛
item.description: Toma Tabatadze's late own goal spared Karim Benzema's blushes as the defender gifted Saudi Arabia's Al-Ittihad a 2-1 win over Navbahor of Uzbekistan on Thursday to set up an Asian Champions League quarter-final meeting with compatriots Al-Hilal.翻译:周四，托马·塔巴塔泽最后时刻的乌龙球让卡里姆·本泽马免于脸红，这名后卫帮助沙特阿拉伯的伊蒂哈德队以 2-1 战胜了乌兹别克斯坦队的纳纳巴霍尔，并在亚冠四分之一决赛中与同胞希拉尔队进行了比赛。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 彭博社报道，日本新日铁中国资产因美国钢铁交易而受到审查
item.description: The Biden administration is examining Nippon Steel's China connection, in relation to the Japanese company's planned acquisition of American rival U.S. Steel , Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道称，拜登政府正在审查新日铁与中国的关系，该公司计划收购美国竞争对手美国钢铁公司。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: First Quantum 因计划增加资本而股价上涨 8%
item.description: Shares in Canadian miner First Quantum Minerals Ltd rose as much as 9% on Thursday as investors heaved a sigh of relief after the company announced measures to boost its balance sheet.翻译:加拿大矿业公司第一量子矿业有限公司 (First Quantum Minerals Ltd) 宣布改善资产负债表的措施后，投资者松了一口气，该公司股价周四上涨 9%。
item.author: Divya Rajagopal

item.title: 美国议员敦促大众汽车退出新疆业务
item.description: The chair of a U.S. House Committee on China and the top Democrat on the panel urged Volkswagen to halt operations in Xinjiang after thousands of vehicles with a small Chinese-made electronic component were held at U.S. ports.翻译:美国众议院中国问题委员会主席和该委员会的民主党高层敦促大众汽车停止在新疆的业务，此前数千辆装有中国制造的小型电子元件的汽车被扣押在美国港口。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 乌克兰战争已过去两年，全球贸易裂痕扩大
item.description: Two years after Russia's invasion of Ukraine, there are clear signs that the global economy is fragmenting into two separate blocs and that multilateral trade rules that have underpinned commerce for nearly 30 years are under threat.翻译:俄罗斯入侵乌克兰两年后，有明显迹象表明全球经济正在分裂成两个独立的集团，近 30 年来支撑商业的多边贸易规则正受到威胁。
item.author: Philip Blenkinsop

item.title: 海德堡材料考虑在美国上市以解决估值差距
item.description: Heidelberg Materials is weighing a listing in the United States as a way to potentially tackle a geographical gap in valuation, its chief executive told analysts on Thursday.翻译:海德堡材料公司首席执行官周四对分析师表示，该公司正在考虑在美国上市，以此作为潜在解决估值地域差距的一种方式。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国电动卡车初创公司Windrose首席执行官表示探索在欧洲生产
item.description: Chinese electric heavy truck start-up Windrose plans to outsource manufacturing of its vehicles to automaking partners in Europe, its founder and CEO said on Thursday, as it seeks to take on rivals Tesla and Mercedes Benz in the region.翻译:中国电动重型卡车初创公司Windrose的创始人兼首席执行官周四表示，该公司计划将其车辆的制造外包给欧洲的汽车制造合作伙伴，以寻求在该地区与特斯拉和梅赛德斯奔驰的竞争对手展开竞争。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国要求国际法院就以色列“非法”占领发表言论
item.description: China asked the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Thursday to give its opinion on Israel's occupation of the Palestinian Territories, which it said was illegal.翻译:中国周四要求国际法院就以色列占领巴勒斯坦领土发表意见，称以色列占领巴勒斯坦领土是非法的。
item.author: Reuters
